text: Sano jwaakun’jongolaga Allah, basi jwalakwe ni jwakongoka, nambo waakwalechelela kusokonechela, basi mmwe ngam’ba mwapatiile akukamuchisya ni gosa jwangawaga Jwalakwe, ni tuchasonganganya Lisiku lya Kiyama chamakuku ali wangalola, wangawecheta soni wangapikana, mauto gao ni ku Jahannama. Ndema jilijose jaukaliteje (Motowo panandi), tukaujonjechesyeje kukwao soni kulapuka
